EmailTemplate.name: Blood Test Reminder Error
EmailTemplate.subject: Blood Test Reminder Messages
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{{Recipient.FirstName}}},
You may have received one or more automated messages from us earlier today reminding you about blood tests.
The messages from earlier today were sent in error, so please ignore the messages on this occasion.
Blood tests are an important part of the treatment regime and we'll be in contact when you next require a test.
We apologise for any confusion.
Thanks,
Optimale
